title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2013 Titan One Goldine #320 PK (Private Key) VersionCoin is funded with face value of 1BTCCOA and funding paper will come with the coinhttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1N2iTvqupttDDUHtfnRLFwtrWM7p4mfUbSTARTING BID: 1.030MINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 28th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: PlutoTheGrey

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: av8rjeff on July 25, 2023, 07:05:07 AM1.030Current high bidEnds in 2 days

comments.author: PlutoTheGrey
comments.body: Sorry @av8rjeff and @minerjones, but I'm CANCELING this auction. There is not enough participation to make me comfortable with this, and the price is not worth my expense and effort. I expect it has much to do with the drama around the Titian 2FA coins. Don't send any funds. I'm canceling the flight and hotel I booked to deliver it.
